intro.first_p: I'm a full stack developer, I could help your company with my problem solving skills and expertise in diferent frameworks and architectures.
intro.second_p: These are some projects I've worked on, webpages, desktop and mobile apps in the frontend, and diferent apis and microservices in the backend.
intro.third_p: Here you can find a list of my skills and technologies I've worked with, and some certifications I've earned.
intro.fourth_p: If you want to know more about me and contact me, you can use the following links.
